condition: doc.workflow_state == "Disbursement Doc List" and doc.source != "Basic Home Loan"
message:
Dear {{ doc.lead_name }},

Congratulations !!

We are thrilled to inform you that your application has been sanctioned by {{doc.lender_selection}} .

You will receive an email with the list of documents required to disburse the loan. Kindly share the

documents at the earliest to avoid any delay.

Regards,

Your Friendly loan buddy

Switch My Loan Pvt. Ltd.
name: Sanctioned
subject: Sanctioned
